distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update fixes a memory leak and an infinite recursion in Data::Dumper. 
(CVE-2014-4330)

Security Issues:

    * CVE-2014-4330
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-4330>
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The Dumper method in Data::Dumper before 2.154, as used in Perl 5.20.1 and earlier, allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption and crash) via an Array-Reference with many nested Array-References, which triggers a large number of recursive calls to the DD_dump function.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
